caption.p: Kaplan–Meier survival curves of m 5C regulatory factors in GI cancer. Kaplan–Meier survival curves were drawn based on the differential expression level of m 5C regulatory factors in GI cancer. The red and green curves showed survival curves of the high and low expression groups, respectively. ∗ P < 0.05, ∗∗ P < 0.01, and ∗∗∗ P < 0.001 between the two groups.
